YOU CAN HAVE CC!

That is a pretty big Kat buff

> [{quoted}](name=DeusVult,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=H6rQrqGv,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2015-10-30T02:52:29.923+0000)
>
> There is a new starting item that gives stacks on kills and builds into mejai's
> 
> That is a pretty big Kat buff

I almost never build that item, that item is made for super safe champions like {{champion:99}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:40}}.

I will consider building it if the enemy team does not pick any form of hard cc and I get to last pick Kat. I build it when the enemy team has 1 or more intentional feeders. I buy it to convince the enemies who do not wish to declare open mid to declare open mid.  Some people buy it as a means to catching up when behind, not me though. To catch up as Kat you simply need to wait for the enemy to be stupid, eventually they will be stupid.

Darius had already triggered noxian might. Dat 200 bonus ad.
Remember rango wins
Get used to it buddy, season 6 will be 10 adcs per game for the first few months.
I'll have fun playing shaco, especially with the vision changes.

Doesn't the new Essence Reaver sound nice with Shaco? Throw in an Infiniy Edge and you'll just about max your Cooldown reduction! Mercurial Scimitar having Lifesteal also seems pretty nice for sustain, damage, magic resistance, and being just that extra bit slippery! :3
WITH {{item:3031}} hitting them with a total of 8 (yes 8!) critting shotgun bullets for... Yeah, good luck LIVING with all those holes in your body...
Actually, IE adds 2 more, so it's 10. Quadruple damage if they all hit the same target. 440% AD at level 18.
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eQAPZBmwBpk/T0CsTmU6pWI/AAAAAAAAAM4/vgKVhpqhPhc/s1600/mother-god-meme.jpg

440% AD per shot.
880% AD for 2 shots.
Reload for 2 seconds.

Collateral Damage optional.

Every pellet that hits cuts half a second off the E cooldown, and E reloads one shell instantly. With Essence Reaver for max CDR, E's cooldown is under 9 seconds, so 2 IE crits (20 pellets, -10 seconds) should reset it completely if most of them hit. AA, E, 2xAA, E, AA, Q, R. That's FOUR autoattacks. Full combo is potentially over 2000% AD He's kind of broken. Damage per extra pellet on the same target scales higher than I thought. It can go up to 472%.
http://i1105.photobucket.com/albums/h348/jbthx1138/Tron%20Gifs/tumblr_lisy63XFyD1qavsh3o1_500.gif
{{champion:44}}:  http://i.qkme.me/3tp9un.jpg
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/001/274/brofistcover.jpg

FUCK YOU
http://imgur.com/np6yQg9
ASSHOLE
why bother playing rengar on PBE if he is not getting changed on PBE?

Because he slaughters what is on the PBE currently. 

And slaughter is good.

What he's saying is that the point of the PBE is to test new additions to see if they're balanced and function correctly.
Countering the new additions just seems... Tryhardy.

... So playing Rengar doesn't count as testing?
Testing that the counters to the new additions still work isn't worthwhile data?
And honestly, do you not think Rengar isn't going to use any of these crazy new AD items??

You got it.

Right now on Rengar I'm running experimental masteries (12/0/18 in live terms) and running a bunch of the new items.  It's good testing for them, and actually kinda interesting to see how a typical anti-ADC assassin fares vs the reworks.
well it matters not my sexy majestic {{champion:104}} will destroy {{champion:107}}
